title: What Daddy Did Today; A Father's Bedtime Story
description: What does Daddy do when he leaves the house each morning? You might be surprised! What Daddy Did Today: A Father’s Bedtime Story is Daddy’s chance to tell his child about the many adventures he encounters throughout his day while he is away from home. But amidst all of the excitement, which includes traveling to outer space to help a planet find its smile, and then hitching a ride from a giant butterfly, Daddy has only one thing on his mind – getting back home to his child.
author: Walter Wally
